title: Azure Cursor Plugin Config
description: Restrict the plugin to read-only or a specific resource group until you feel confident.

restrictedMode.description: When true, enforces scope restrictions. Set to false for full access.

scope.description: readOnly: no create/update/delete. resourceGroup: only allow operations within the specified resource group.

resourceGroup.description: Required when scope is resourceGroup. All write operations must target this resource group only.
